tier.item: (1) a. Kabin-ga ware- ta. (Inactive intransitive)
vase- NOM break- PAST
`The vase broke.'

vase- NOM break- PAST
`The vase broke.'
Kabin-ga ware-ta. (Inactive intransitive)
vase-NOM break-PAST
The vase broke.
b. Taroo- ga kabin - o wat - ta. (Transitive)
NOM vase- ACC bre ak- PAST
`Taro broke the vase.'

(Transitive)
NOM vase-ACC bre ak-PAST

NOM vase- ACC break - CAUS -PAST
`Taro made the vase break.'

NOM vase- ACC break - CAUS -PAST
`Taro made the vase break.'

(Intransitive- based causative)
NOM vase-ACC break-CAUS-PAST
